mapper.insert: insert into newsinfo (AutoID, NewsName, NewsTitle, PushTime, KeyWords, ImgUrl, Weight, Description, NewsType, ReadCount, CreateDate, ModifyDate, NewsContext,IsDel) values (#{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newsTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{newsContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{IsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update newsinfo
NewsName = #{newsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NewsTitle = #{newsTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PushTime = #{pushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
KeyWords = #{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ImgUrl = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NewsType = #{newsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ReadCount = #{readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ModifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NewsContext = #{newsContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
IsDel = #{IsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where AutoID = #{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update newsinfo set NewsName = #{newsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NewsTitle = #{newsTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PushTime = #{pushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, KeyWords = #{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ImgUrl = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NewsType = #{newsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ReadCount = #{readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ModifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NewsContext = #{newsContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, IsDel = #{IsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where AutoID = #{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update newsinfo set NewsName = #{newsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NewsTitle = #{newsTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PushTime = #{pushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, KeyWords = #{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ImgUrl = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NewsType = #{newsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ReadCount = #{readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ModifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IsDel = #{IsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where AutoID = #{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select AutoID, NewsName, NewsTitle, date_format(PushTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')PushTime, KeyWords, ImgUrl, Weight, Description, NewsType, ReadCount, date_format(CreateDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CreateDate, date_format(ModifyDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ModifyDate,IsDel from newsinfo where IsDel = 1
AND NewsName like CONCAT('%', #{keywords},'%')
AND KeyWords like CONCAT('%', #{keywords},'%')
